scripts.test:coverage: export NODE_ENV=test || SET "NODE_ENV=test" && export NODE_OPTIONS='--experimental-loader @istanbuljs/esm-loader-hook --no-warnings' || SET "NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-loader @istanbuljs/esm-loader-hook --no-warnings" && nyc --reporter=text mocha --require esm --experimental-modules
scripts.test:coverageAll: export NODE_ENV=test || SET "NODE_ENV=test" && export NODE_OPTIONS='--experimental-loader @istanbuljs/esm-loader-hook --no-warnings' || SET "NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-loader @istanbuljs/esm-loader-hook --no-warnings" && nyc --reporter=text mocha --require esm '*.test.js'
